forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. Southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph.

weather_report:
As the quiet hours of the early morning drift through Downtown San Francisco, a gentle cloak of clouds blankets the city, softly cradling its dreams. The temperature lingers around the mild 57 degrees, promising a brisk yet refreshing breath of air with winds whispering from the southwest. The allure of the approaching day hints at partly sunny skies, suggesting a promising warmth, with a high reaching into the comfortable mid-60s before gradually settling into a cool embrace by afternoon.

The visibility is intertwined with the remnants of the marine layer, teasing glimpses of the Golden Gate from above but keeping the familiar sights shrouded in a veil of mystery. For those ready to embrace the day, a light jacket would offer comfort as the sun rises, and layers will serve well as the weather evolves, offering a canvas perfect for a stroll through the winding streets or perhaps an afternoon of exploration at a local art gallery. The ambiance speaks of a day where tranquillity reigns, inviting moments of reflection or simple enjoyment—making it an easy choice for a leisurely coffee at a corner café as the city gently stirs to life.
